room_title: Escape room "LockDown" by Erebus Escape in Detroit
Escape room "LockDown" by Erebus Escape in Detroit
review: Best escape room I've done by far. The realism, theming, puzzles, and effects were excellently done. At all points, there was something for everybody to be doing, and it really put teamwork front and center. I can't wait until the next room opens up,

room_title: Escape room "LockDown" by Erebus Escape in Detroit
review: I have been to many different rooms in the last few years. This is my favorite so far! Lots of detail put into the room and the puzzles. The puzzles are different than what I have seen before. Very excited to escape with 5m33s left and using no clues! Whoot!

room_title: Escape room "LockDown" by Erebus Escape in Detroit
review: Hardest one we've tried so far! Will definitely go back and try another! Definitely has the Erebus quality... When you start, you feel like you've entered a different environment. Our challenge was in a jail cell and we felt like it! Definitely recommend!

room_title: Escape room "LockDown" by Erebus Escape in Detroit
review: Erebus Escape is a much more detailed and challenging (in a good way) than any other escape rooms I've been to! Our game master was passionate, very informative and made me feel comfortable about the game. I will definitely be returning soon!

room_title: Escape room "LockDown" by Erebus Escape in Detroit
review: Such an exciting experience for sure! Lots of amazing details and fun, brain teasing puzzles. Shocked by the amount of realism put into the rooms! Kudos to the owners, set creators and staff for bringing a safe and fun game to enjoy with a group of people. There were 6 of us and it was great to see how everyone worked together. I can't wait for the other rooms to open! We will definitely be going back for more fun.
